column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as our takeout items are concerned
column2: the size and shape of our ToGo containers are somewhat misleading. We serve the same amount of broth and toppings in our ToGo orders as we do for dine-in clients. Each bowl of ramen comprises 2-1/2 cups of broth as measured by a specific ladle. Nothing is "eye-balled
column3: as doing so would result in an inconsistent product.
